name: Jishin Day
description:
JishinDay is a Trbute short game about the 2011 east japan earthquake.

You start in your classroom, but the end? Will you survive or die? It would be best to think twice before acting, where to go, what to do, all of that...To survive. Because once the warning alarm starts, You have less than 10 SECONDS to think. So save your time ;)  

 

ControlskeyMoving WASD
Looking MouseInteracting E

The game is still on beta early access - Join the discord to report bugs and chat with me if you have any ideas to add: https://discord.gg/pnqqTk4pwM
